original_text: And as for the Avvites who lived in villages as far as Gaza, the Caphtorites coming out from Caphtor destroyed them and settled in their place.)
korean_text: 또 갑돌에서 나온 갑돌 사람이 가사까지 각 촌에 거주하는 아위 사람을 멸하고 그들을 대신하여 거기에 거주하였느니라)

sentences.original_text: who lived in villages as far as Gaza,
the Caphtorites coming out from Caphtor destroyed them
sentences.korean_translation: 가브토르에서 나온 가브도르 사람들이 그들을 멸하고
